languages.text: {n}Молодой женщине, стоящей перед Абеляром, приходится прилагать массу усилий, чтобы не дрожать под напором гнева старшего офицера. Она запинается, но все же выговаривает, глядя ему в глаза:{/n} "Прошу... прошу прощения, старший офицер. Но я должна поговорить с Лорд-капитаном".

{n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой женщине, стоящей перед Абеляром, приходится прилагать массу усилий, чтобы не дрожать под напором гнева старшего офицера. Она запинается, но все же выговаривает, глядя ему в глаза:{/n} "Прошу... прошу прощения, старший офицер. Но я должна поговорить с Лорд-капитаном".

traits.locale_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologize, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}一位年轻的中尉站在阿贝拉德面前，努力不让自己在上级军官的怒火下退缩。她犹豫不决，但还是努力地看着阿贝拉德的双眼。{/n}“我……我很抱歉，长官，但我必须和舰长大人谈谈。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位年轻的中尉站在阿贝拉德面前，努力不让自己在上级军官的怒火下退缩。她犹豫不决，但还是努力地看着阿贝拉德的双眼。{/n}“我……我很抱歉，长官，但我必须和舰长大人谈谈。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}La joven que está ante Abelard se esfuerza por no temblar ante la furia de su superior. Sus fuerzas flaquean, pero logra mirarle a los ojos y responder:{/n} «Lo... Lo lamento, señor, pero debo hablar con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}La joven que está ante Abelard se esfuerza por no temblar ante la furia de su superior. Sus fuerzas flaquean, pero logra mirarle a los ojos y responder:{/n} «Lo... Lo lamento, señor, pero debo hablar con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの前に立つ若い女性は、上司の怒りの猛攻撃に怯まないよう、全身全霊で努力した。彼女はためらいながらも、なんとか彼の目を見て言った。{/n}「も…申し訳ありません。ですが、ロード・キャプテンに話をしなければならないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの前に立つ若い女性は、上司の怒りの猛攻撃に怯まないよう、全身全霊で努力した。彼女はためらいながらも、なんとか彼の目を見て言った。{/n}「も…申し訳ありません。ですが、ロード・キャプテンに話をしなければならないのです」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Die junge Frau, die vor Abelard steht, bemüht sich mit aller Macht, unter dem stürmischen Zorn ihres Vorgesetzten nicht in die Knie zu gehen. Sie zögert, doch dann gelingt es ihr, ihm die Augen zu blicken, und sie sagt:{/n} "Ich ... ich bitte um Verzeihung, Sir. Doch ich muss mit dem Lord Captain sprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die junge Frau, die vor Abelard steht, bemüht sich mit aller Macht, unter dem stürmischen Zorn ihres Vorgesetzten nicht in die Knie zu gehen. Sie zögert, doch dann gelingt es ihr, ihm die Augen zu blicken, und sie sagt:{/n} "Ich ... ich bitte um Verzeihung, Sir. Doch ich muss mit dem Lord Captain sprechen."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme qui fait face à Abélard s'efforce à grand-peine de ne pas perdre ses moyens devant la colère de son supérieur. Après un instant d'hésitation, elle parvient à le regarder droit dans les yeux et déclare :{/n} « Je... Veuillez m'excuser, monsieur, mais je dois parler {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de toute urgence. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme qui fait face à Abélard s'efforce à grand-peine de ne pas perdre ses moyens devant la colère de son supérieur. Après un instant d'hésitation, elle parvient à le regarder droit dans les yeux et déclare :{/n} « Je... Veuillez m'excuser, monsieur, mais je dois parler {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} de toute urgence. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın önünde duran genç kadın, üstünün hışmına direnmek için var gücüyle çabalıyor. Bir an için bocalayıp toparlanıyor ve göz göze gelmeyi başarıyor.{/n} "B... Bağışlayın efendim. Lord Kaptan'la konuşmalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman standing before Abelard strives with all her might not to quail under the onslaught of her superior's anger. She falters but then manages to look him in the eye and say,{/n} "I... I apologise, sir. But I must speak to the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın önünde duran genç kadın, üstünün hışmına direnmek için var gücüyle çabalıyor. Bir an için bocalayıp toparlanıyor ve göz göze gelmeyi başarıyor.{/n} "B... Bağışlayın efendim. Lord Kaptan'la konuşmalıyım."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
